title: Global leading countries in wine export 2018 , based on volume
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in million hectoliters for 11 number of Countrys.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Country Spain and minimum Country New Zealand.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in million hectoliters for 11 number of Countrys.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Country Spain and minimum Country New Zealand.
max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
Country Spain has the highest Export volume in million hectoliters and New Zealand has the lowest Export volume in million hectoliters.
The highest value at Country Spain is 8.08x times more than the lowest value at New Zealand.
Export volume in million hectoliters at Country Spain is 21.0 , second place is Italy at 19.7, and thirdly is France at 14.1.
The Country Spain tends to be 2.49 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 92.6.
